content:
2015-08:Climbing Stairs

Time Limit: 1 sec

Background

Source of the problem: LeetCode

Description

You are climbing a stair case. It takes n steps to reach to the top.

Each time you can either climb 1 or 2 steps. In how many distinct ways can you climb to the top?

Input

Each test case contains only one line, with only one positive integer n (n ≤ 100), which indicates the number of steps to reach to the top.

Output

For each test case, print the number of distinct ways you can climb to the top.

Sample Input

Sample Output

4

5

Hint

In theory, this problem can be solved by dynamic programming; but in practice, you definitely have known the rationale behind the problem since you were in the high school (while you didn't know about dynamic programming).

Source: LeetCode
Author: 吳凱強
Keyword:
